text:
:wave:  I’m interested too

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> is there a solution now ?
We are currently just doing “NAME” and “NAME (Preview)” for this — but I’m expecting some customer confusion about why one is “Preview”
I am crying and laughing at the same time

Yes, same workaround for me too — PO already complained. I also tried adding spaces afterwords, which fails the regex validator. Was considering using a look-alike Cyrillic character, but that seems like overkill.

For me, I think the best solution is to let an extension work for multiple surfaces (since we have all the tools for responsive layouts) but I think it’s more likely we will get the name uniqueness removed
